name: MobiDev
description:
MobiDev provides custom software development.
 
Main areas of expertise:
➤  Web development 
➤  Mobile development (iOS/Android and cross-platform)
➤  Augmented Reality
➤  IoT & Hardware Integration
➤  Artificial Intelligence. Data Science & Machine Learning
➤  Microservices & Cloud infrastructure
 
For 3 years in a row, our services won the recognition of the world's largest online platform for remote collaboration UpWork. MobiDev was awarded #1 place in the spheres of Web, Mobile & Software Development.
 
MobiDev completed over 320 projects for clients from 20+ countries around the globe including a number of long­-term Enterprise clients from the USA and Europe.
